## code
```{r}
x=c(rep(0,7),rep(1,93))
n=100000
ind=rep(0,n)
ptm=proc.time()
for(i in 1:n){
  ming=sample(x,50)
  if(min(ming)==0){ ind[i]=1 }
}
```

## result
```{r}
cat("prob =",mean(ind))
cat("running time =", (proc.time()-ptm)["elapsed"],"s")
```
